description: Faction Technology, Inc. is a leader in developing right-sized driverless vehicle fleets. As pioneers in supervised autonomous mobility, Faction is dedicated to creating innovative solutions that redefine the future of transportation. With a commitment to sustainability, safety, and technological excellence, Faction is driving the evolution of autonomous mobility for a smarter, more connected world. Learn more at www.faction.us.

founders.name: Ain McKendrick, Founder
founders.description:
Currently CEO at Faction Technology.  Prior to founding Faction, Ain has focused on autonomous systems on everything from light electric vehicles to the first successful driverless semi trucks to run on public highways.

Before getting in to the vehicle space, Ain spent a number of years in consumer electronics at Netflix, Dell, TiVo, and various startups.  He began his career as one of the founders of Palm Computing developing the original PalmPilot handheld digital assistants.

# One technology.Multiple applications.
From on-demand vehicles to last-mile delivery and rebalancing operations, Faction enables driverless capabilities for micro EVs.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60f580fff7c9bf5138118b1e/634f9ca745e80b4f7c4ab9fe_hero-pic_mobile.jpg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60f580fff7c9bf5138118b1e/6436efed0b48525930b290e9_Faction%20Fleet.webp)
## Deliver the Future
Elevate your delivery with right-sized, zero-emission, driverless solutions. Faction’s Software Suite ensures seamless integration with your fulfillment and order management systems. All of this at a competitive price.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60f580fff7c9bf5138118b1e/656e29d5f3ce3fbcbc41d103_deliverTheFuture-img.webp)
## Vehicle On-Demand
Faction's driverless technology empowers ride-share companies to bring the car to the customer and recover it from their drop-off location, streamlining each trip from start to finish.
[Read more about Faction and GoCar’s partnership →](http://www.faction.us/<https:/www.faction.us/blog/faction-plans-to-deploy-310-driverless-enabled-arcimoto-fuvs-with-gocar-tours>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60f580fff7c9bf5138118b1e/656e2d966f27801984ef15f0_vehicleOnDemand-img%20\(1\).webp)
## Industries
Designed to tackle a diverse array of missions, our driverless solutions are engineered for adaptability across multiple industries.
[Airfields](http://www.faction.us/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Grocery](http://www.faction.us/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Fast Food](http://www.faction.us/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[Delivery Fleets](http://www.faction.us/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60f580fff7c9bf5138118b1e/656e344edb380c076b4846fd_industr_airfields-img.webp)
Optimize your transport and supply chain with autonomous operation in controlled environments.
Our pragmatic approach to autonomy allows for quick, cost-effective deployment, which is ideal for secure, closed-course commercial areas.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60f580fff7c9bf5138118b1e/656e380651f905a8e3aedf3d_industr_grocery-img.webp)
Minimize your carbon footprint by using lightweight, driverless electric vehicles.
The Faction software suite allows your customers to track orders live and interact with the vehicle over the app.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60f580fff7c9bf5138118b1e/656e38095f00c6f2c5577c0d_industr_fastFood-img.webp)
Speed up your delivery times without sacrificing quality.
Our software suite integrates smoothly with your existing order management systems, allowing for real-time tracking and customer engagement via the app.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60f580fff7c9bf5138118b1e/656e380c2666f4fd081b9265_industr_fleets-img.webp)
Achieve new levels of efficiency and reliability by deploying Faction's driverless vehicles in your commercial fleet.
Real-time tracking and fleet management will keep your operations agile, carbon-neutral, and cost-efficient.
## Unlocking the benefits of autonomy
### Pragmatic Driverless
Our practical approach to autonomy combines baseline autonomy with a trajectory-based assist system, enabling immediate deployment.
### End-to-End Solution
Driverless-enabled vehicles, cloud-based fleet management, customer portals, and APIs come together for seamless integration with your existing systems.
### Fleet Electrification
Make the switch to greener, more cost-effective operations by electrifying your fleet with micro EVs capable of driverless operations.
## Fast track to a smarter fleet
1
Our team assesses your current operations and local policies to draft the roadmap for fleet electrification and driverless deployment
2
Faction deploys a test EV fleet that runs business as usual with safety drivers on board to map your area of operations
3
Our team completes integration points between our cloud solutions and your fleet or order management system
4
Gradual roll-out of driverless operations with safety drivers as backup
5
Evaluate the results and further scale electrification and driverless operations
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60f580fff7c9bf5138118b1e/6572d9e76584042e4cb7d555_trackFleet-img%20\(2\).webp)

**Faction Technology, Inc.: Redefining Transportation with Driverless Electric Vehicles**

Founded in 2020 as part of Y Combinator's W21 batch, Faction Technology, Inc. epitomizes the future of autonomous mobility. Located in South San Francisco, CA, and staffed by a team of 25, Faction is on a mission to deliver driverless electric vehicles at a fraction of traditional car costs. Their ambitions are grounded in a commitment to sustainability, safety, and technological innovation.

**What They Do:**
Faction aims to transform transportation by offering right-sized driverless fleets that cater to various needs—from on-demand vehicle services to last-mile deliveries. The innovations they bring to the table aren't just about self-driving; they encompass a comprehensive software suite that integrates seamlessly with existing fulfillment and order management systems, making driving more efficient and environmentally friendly.

Their driverless technology is adaptable across a range of industries, including airfields, grocery, fast food, and delivery fleets. This flexibility allows businesses to enhance operations, reduce their carbon footprint with lighter EVs, and engage customers through real-time order tracking via an application.

**Technology and Approach:**
At Faction, they take a pragmatic approach to autonomy. Their solutions combine baseline autonomy with a trajectory-based assist system, allowing for rapid deployment while ensuring safety with backup drivers during initial rollouts. They also emphasize fleet electrification, encouraging companies to adopt micro EVs that can operate autonomously, significantly impacting their operational costs and ecological footprint.

**Getting Started:**
For businesses looking to transition to driverless operations, Faction follows a structured roadmap:
1. Assess current operations and regulations.
2. Deploy a test fleet with drivers to gather operational data.
3. Integrate their cloud technology with existing management systems.
4. Gradually scale up to fully driverless operations.

**Future-Proofing Transport:**
Faction is at the forefront of the autonomous vehicle revolution, working closely with partners like GoCar to expand their impact. Their solutions promise to make transportation smarter, safer, and more connected, laying the groundwork for a future where sustainable mobility is accessible to all.

Explore more about Faction's journey and capabilities at [Faction.us](http://www.faction.us).
